languages.text: "Перед тем, как мы обсудим ваши дела, ответь на один вопрос. Ты приказывал Соломону лгать мне и втираться в доверие?"
"Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"
languages.original_text: "Перед тем, как мы обсудим ваши дела, ответь на один вопрос. Ты приказывал Соломону лгать мне и втираться в доверие?"

traits.locale_text: "Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"
"Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"
"Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"
"Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"
"Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"

languages.text: "Bevor wir über Eure Angelegenheiten sprechen, beantwortet eine Frage: Habt Ihr Solomorne befohlen, mich anzulügen, um sich mein Vertrauen zu erschleichen?"
languages.original_text: "Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"

traits.locale_text: "Bevor wir über Eure Angelegenheiten sprechen, beantwortet eine Frage: Habt Ihr Solomorne befohlen, mich anzulügen, um sich mein Vertrauen zu erschleichen?"

languages.text: « Avant que nous abordions vos affaires, répondez à cette question : avez-vous ordonné à Solomorne de me mentir et de gagner ma confiance ? »
languages.original_text: "Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"

traits.locale_text: « Avant que nous abordions vos affaires, répondez à cette question : avez-vous ordonné à Solomorne de me mentir et de gagner ma confiance ? »

languages.text: 「君の件について話す前に、一つ質問に答えてくれ。君はソロモーンに、{mf|俺|私}に嘘をつき、信頼を得るよう命じたのか？」
languages.original_text: "Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"

traits.locale_text: 「君の件について話す前に、一つ質問に答えてくれ。君はソロモーンに、{mf|俺|私}に嘘をつき、信頼を得るよう命じたのか？」

languages.text: «Antes de hablar de sus asuntos, responda a una pregunta. ¿Ordenó a Solomorne que me mintiera y que se ganara mi confianza?».
languages.original_text: "Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"

traits.locale_text: «Antes de hablar de sus asuntos, responda a una pregunta. ¿Ordenó a Solomorne que me mintiera y que se ganara mi confianza?».

languages.text: “讨论你的事情之前，先回答我一个问题：你有没有命令索罗蒙对我说谎，以此骗取我的信任？”
languages.original_text: "Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"

traits.locale_text: “讨论你的事情之前，先回答我一个问题：你有没有命令索罗蒙对我说谎，以此骗取我的信任？”

languages.text: "Diğer meselelere geçmeden önce tek bir sorum var: Solomorne'a bana yalan söyleyip güvenimi sarsmasını mı emrettin?"
languages.original_text: "Before we discuss your affairs, answer one question: did you order Solomorne to lie to me and insinuate himself into my confidence?"

traits.locale_text: "Diğer meselelere geçmeden önce tek bir sorum var: Solomorne'a bana yalan söyleyip güvenimi sarsmasını mı emrettin?"
